Yesssss, I am going to have way too much fun with this.

Real Fuels doesn't appear to be playing nicely with the Almach. RCS won't transfer from the little spheroid tanks to the engine (the Vos-909,) so you have to use a full sized RCS tank, which totally kills the TWR/ISP.

I wasn't sure if this was an issue to post in the RF topic or here...I figured I'd post it here first.

Real Fuels doesn't appear to be playing nicely with the Almach. RCS won't transfer from the little spheroid tanks to the engine (the Vos-909,) so you have to use a full sized RCS tank, which totally kills the TWR/ISP.

I wasn't sure if this was an issue to post in the RF topic or here...I figured I'd post it here first.

This is by design I think. They change monoprop to... well, not monoprop. You'd need crossfeedenabler (I don't have the link handy) on the tanks most likely to make it work.

The same issue happens in stock for LFO radial tanks, for what it's worth.

I think the right place is in the stockalike fuels thread, but its a tossup; it's more of a tank issue so that goes to RF... but it's a tantares so it goes here... Gahhh

Yesssss, I am going to have way too much fun with this.

I have discovered a bug that makes KSP loading stop Tantares - Tavio-SD4 part's textures and using ActiveTextureManagement.

Therefore I made a config to make ATM not compress TantaresLV folder

Here for people who have the same problem

ACTIVE_TEXTURE_MANAGER_CONFIG
{
	folder = TantaresLV
	enabled  = false
}

So, make a notepad file, copypaste the above and save it as .cfg file.

Put it in \GameData\ActiveTextureManagement\ActiveTextureManagerConfigs\

And load KSP.

Cheers, flamerboy67664

http://img98.rajce.idnes.cz/d9802/10/10447/10447390_7baedd9cfb1ead1a3fc4c0161e06b526/images/screenshot1_1.jpg?ver=0

I have discovered a bug that makes KSP loading stop Tantares - Tavio-SD4 part's textures and using ActiveTextureManagement.

Therefore I made a config to make ATM not compress TantaresLV folder

Here for people who have the same problem

ACTIVE_TEXTURE_MANAGER_CONFIG
{
	folder = TantaresLV
	enabled  = false
}

So, make a notepad file, copypaste the above and save it as .cfg file.

Put it in \GameData\ActiveTextureManagement\ActiveTextureManagerConfigs\

And load KSP.

Cheers, flamerboy67664
